Meanwhile, we're working hard to find you the best-match project. Once we're done, we'll be happy to proceed to the final stage of our onboarding process  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"–\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"12.0pt\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Times you have questions related to services, processes, and technical issues in EPAM Anywhere the chatbot is your main 24/7 support destination. Ask a question in English, the chatbot will look for an answer using keywords and display the most relevant information. If the chatbot doesn’t have the information you are interested in, it will create a ticket and managers will try to help with your request as soon as possible.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To find the chatbot:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"follow the link \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/Anywhere-Fellows-Assistant\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://epa.ms/Anywhere-Fellows-Assistant\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"or write \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Anywhere Fellows Assistant\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in the MS Teams search (the chatbot will be in the apps section) and push \\\"Add\\\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After installation, the chatbot will write a welcome message in the MS Teams chat. Pin this chat to easily return to it.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People who ensure you have a good experience at EPAM:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":124486,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b79fdfcf-5a97-46e0-9988-1032f7fdda1a/page1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b79fdfcf-5a97-46e0-9988-1032f7fdda1a/page1.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"page1.PNG\",\"name\":\"page1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b79fdfcf-5a97-46e0-9988-1032f7fdda1a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":573,\"height\":174},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
